[haas.discovery]
rest-test = usagi.discoverer:RestTestDiscoverer
usagi = usagi.discoverer:RestTestDiscoverer

[usagi.assertions]
body = usagi.plugins.assertions:BodyAssertion
header = usagi.plugins.assertions:HeaderAssertion
status_code = usagi.plugins.assertions:StatusCodeAssertion

[usagi.parameters]
body = usagi.plugins.test_parameters:BodyTestParameter
headers = usagi.plugins.test_parameters:HeadersTestParameter
method = usagi.plugins.test_parameters:MethodTestParameter
queryparams = usagi.plugins.test_parameters:QueryParamsTestParameter

[usagi.var_loaders]
env = usagi.plugins.var_loaders:EnvVarLoader
file = usagi.plugins.var_loaders:FileVarLoader
ref = usagi.plugins.var_loaders:RefVarLoader
template = usagi.plugins.var_loaders:TemplateVarLoader
